judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The appeal is transferred to the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Thomas 8. MeCready, Public Defender, for appellant.
James A. Wimmer, Assistant District Attorney, and John Deutseh, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Vladyka, Appellant.
Submitted January 5, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Thomas 8. MeCready, Public Defender, for appellant.
James A. Wimmer, Assistant District Attorney, and John Deutseh, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
July 15, 1971:
